item.title: ZmFDR4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ZmFDR4 Gene Name: Fe deficiency-related 4 Genome: Species: Zea mays Functional Descriptions: Zea mays Fe deficiency-related 4 (ZmFDR4) functions as an iron transporter in the plastids of monocots.
